meanings.definition: The world or community of films and filmmaking.
meanings.sent1: Many aspiring actors dream of making it big in filmdoms.
meanings.sent2: She immersed herself in the exciting world of filmdoms.
meanings.sent3: In the bustling city of Filmtown, everyone breathes and lives filmdoms.
meanings.sent4: The magic of filmdoms transports us to different worlds and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The glamour and drama of filmdoms captivate audiences worldwide.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being related to films or the film industry.
meanings.sent1: His passion for filmdoms led him to pursue a career in cinematography.
meanings.sent2: The event celebrated the creativity and innovation of filmdoms.
meanings.sent3: Even in everyday conversations, his mind always drifts back to filmdoms.
meanings.sent4: Her life was a series of scenes, each filled with the essence of filmdoms.
meanings.sent5: The essence of filmdoms is captured in every frame of this masterpiece.
